channel.title: Main Window :: Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: 1. MIDI/audio window selectors Clicking on the button labeled “MIDI” or “Audio” will open and close the MIDI or audio interface window, respectively.

item.title: Beat Input
item.description: 2. BEAT INPUT Input Selector Djazz plays a beat each time it receives a message (a “tap,” or “click”), if it is engaged (how to engage Djazz will be explained below).

item.title: Song Grid
item.description: When a song is loaded, its grid will appear. The cells of the grid change color depending on whether Djazz is engaged and whether a cell is currently playing or not.

item.title: MIDI Input Selector
item.description: 1. MIDI Flush This will clear any sounding MIDI output.
